## StabilityDepositChange type

Represents the change between two Stability Deposit states.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type StabilityDepositChange<T> = {
    depositONEU: T;
    withdrawONEU?: undefined;
} | {
    depositONEU?: undefined;
    withdrawONEU: T;
    withdrawAllONEU: boolean;
};
```
